nodes.text: Captain of the Guard, also written as captain of the guard, was the title held by the captain of the Black Sun Guard, the captain Zygerrian royal guard, and the captain of the Galactic Republic's Senate Guard.
Mercenary Lang served as Captain of the Guard, where he commanded Magistrate Morgan Elsbeth's forces that defended the walled city of Corvus.

When aboard a starship of the First Order Navy, Stormtroopers of the Order would follow a captain of the guard as their ultimate authority. Despite this special chain of command, stormtroopers would follow the commands of any officer, regardless of their military branch, during an alert.
